opendial.inference.exact

Class VariableElimination

  • java.lang.Object
    • opendial.inference.exact.VariableElimination
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InferenceAlgorithm

    public class VariableElimination
extends java.lang.Object
implements InferenceAlgorithm
    Implementation of the Variable Elimination algorithm NB: make this more efficient by discarding irrelevant variables! also see Koller's book to compare the algorithm
    Version:
    $Date:: 2014-01-30 22:55:33 #$
    Author:
    Pierre Lison (plison@ifi.uio.no)
